originalText.text: I can‚Äôt say enough good things. I wish Google had more than 5 stars to give. Ricki is who you want behind the lens. She‚Äôs so comforting and can put anyone at ease. She‚Äôs funny, sweet and so knowledgeable about lighting and angles. She took any opportunity for good shots of us and never missed a moment of our city hall wedding day. All the candid moments when we were truly just being ‚Äúus‚Äù were captured. The communication leading up to the day were always quick and to the point, she knew so much with all her experience I called her our city hall ambassador :) We even received the photos from the shoot that night!! The world of finding a photographer online in NYC is overwhelming and scary and I feel so lucky to have found Ricki! I will use her for all future photography and cannot recommend her enough. Thank you Ricki for all of our beautiful memoriesüíõ

originalText.text:
We did the Greenwich Village night tour with Ricki and this was such a fun little tour!! We had the best time.
Ricki is lovely and knows so much about the area and what makes it special- especially at night. We had already done a village tour before that but it was a classic day time tour, so this nightlife tour was really different and unique!
I would recommend it even if it's not your first time¬†at¬†the¬†village!
The pizza was the best :)

originalText.text:
I highly recommend!

Ricki has an amazing knack for capturing moments with a fun and friendly approach, making my 12 years old daughter feel at ease in front of the camera‚Ä¶

If you're looking for a top talented photographer who can bring a sense of humor and warmth to every shoot, Ricki is the perfect choice.

originalText.text:
I asked Ricki for an experience that will combine pro photo shoots and a guided tour as a birthday surprise for my mother. It was amazing- Ricki is super professional, nice and made this day so delightful. We needed up with tones of special moments, hundreds of excellent photos and had a chance to visit a few very unique locations in NY city.
